techmeme.title: Solid, which offers APIs for banking, payments, cards, and crypto products and had raised $81M, files for Chapter 11, citing a "costly" lawsuit with FTV Capital (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
Tel Aviv-based Anecdotes, which helps automate corporate governance, risk, and compliance processes, raised a $30M Series B extension, taking the round to $55M (Sophie Shulman/CTech)
Artisan, which is building AI sales development representatives, raised a $25M Series A led by Glade Brook Capital, after raising $12M in September 2024 (Julie Bort/TechCrunch)
Austin-based network security startup Portnox, which develops zero-trust access control tools, raised a $37.5M Series B, taking its total funding to $59.5M (Duncan Riley/SiliconANGLE)
OpenAI launches the Pioneers Program, which aims to work with "multiple companies" to design tailored AI benchmarks for specific domains like legal and finance (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
